text: Beta-blockers: Glaucoma Bradycardia refractory to Timolol maleate or Betaxolol atropine; bronchospasm in hydrochloride) asthmatics Carbonic anhydrase inhibitors: | Glaucoma Metabolic acidosis, electrolyte Acetazolamide (diamox) abnormalities, allergies, including Stevens-Johnson syndrome Cyclopentolate or Atropine and vomiting, tachycardia Alpha-adrenergic Pupil dilatation Hypertension, tachycardia sympathomimetic agents: 9Phenylephrine 2.5%) NSAIDS: Pain relief Potential to worsen or Diclofenac sodium, Ketorolac precipitate acute asthma trometamol 0.5% Local anaesthetic agents: | Pain relief or prevention Local anaesthetic toxicity, Amethocaine (Tetracaine), particularly preterm neonates Oxybuprocaine, Proxymetacaine
